name: Love is like a spittoon
description:
You will play as Anna Buttclench, a young go-getter who has her eyes set on the new guy in town. Bring him something special to win his affection!

It would be very rude if you kept that something special for yourself.

Submitted for cowboy 8625's week jam!

Most of the images are made by me and my sister, but I also got some very nice images from artists/companies.

Currently locked at 1680x1050 resolution, scaling didn't go as planned 0_O

This is my first game. Love it or else.
